title: Below the Radar
description: Captain Robert Gallo has it all – a job as a Pilot for a major airline, a beautiful home, fast car and women who adore him. Then, he meets Monica and his world ends up in a tailspin as this woman spins his life out of control. From the first meeting, until his life ends up hanging in the balance, he can’t get her out of his head.Monica has lived the exact opposite life of Robert, traveling the continent with her missionary parents, then ending up on her own in Seattle where she works at a dead-end job in a coffee shop at the Seattle Airport. From the moment she meets Robert, she thinks he’s nothing more than another arrogant pilot, but she can’t fight her attraction to the man.With the help of Robert’s Uncle Sherman, and his unbelievably gorgeous brothers, Monica will find that the highlight of her day is the moment she connects eyes with her Captain Gallo. This book has it all, romance, a terrifying plane crash, and a love that will conquer. Meet the sexy Aviator Gallo’s and watch as they find love, and do everything they can to hold onto the ones they love.
author: Mary Joyce
